title: Dangers of Technology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/9/21
itunes:title: Dangers of Technology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/9/21
description:
George Noory and author William Henry explore his research into artificial intelligence and social media, and how technology is being developed that dehumanizes people and makes them more likely to take the mark of the beast.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
